notes: Interrupts the user's channeling spells upon cast.

The invisibility is lost upon reaching the cast point of spells, or upon finishing an attack (for ranged heroes upon projectile launch). This means when the attack misses, the invisibility is still lost.

Does not grant the user phased movement.
abilities.description: Causes you to become invisible for 6 seconds.

additionalInformation: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
Increases all heroes' total magic resistance to 40%, assuming basic 25% magic resistance and no other sources of magic resistance.
The evasion stacks diminishingly with other sources of evasion.
